com.variant.server.api

Interface StateRequest


  • public interface StateRequest
    State request, as returned by Session.getStateRequest(). Cannot be directly manipulated by the client code, i.e. all methods are read-only.
    Since:
    0.7

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  StateRequest.Status 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Optional<Variation.Experience> getLiveExperience(Variation variation)
      The live experience in a given variation, if any.
      java.util.Set<Variation.Experience> getLiveExperiences()
      Targeted experiences in variations instrumented on the target state.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getResolvedParameters()
      The resolved state parameters as an immutable map, containing the merged maps of the state parameters defined at the state level and at the state variant level, with the latter taking precedence over former.
      java.util.Optional<StateVariant> getResolvedStateVariant()
      The state variant to which this state request resolved at run time.
      Session getSession()
      User session to which this state request belongs.
      State getState()
      The target state of this state request.
      StateRequest.Status getStatus()
      The current status of this state request.

    • Method Detail

      • getSession

        Session getSession()
        User session to which this state request belongs.
        Returns:
        An object of type Session. Cannot be null.
        Since:
        0.7

      • getState

        State getState()
        The target state of this state request.
        Returns:
        An object of type State. Cannot be null.
        Since:

      • getStatus

        StateRequest.Status getStatus()
        The current status of this state request.
        Returns:
        An object of type StateRequest.Status. Cannot be null.
        Since:

      • getLiveExperiences

        java.util.Set<Variation.Experience> getLiveExperiences()

        Targeted experiences in variations instrumented on the target state. An experience is live iff a) this session has been targeted for it, b) its containing variation is instrumented on this state, and c) is neither off nor disqualified in this session.

        Returns:
        A Set of Variation.Experience objects. Cannot be null, but may be empty.
        Since:
        0.7

      • getLiveExperience

        java.util.Optional<Variation.Experience> getLiveExperience(Variation variation)
        The live experience in a given variation, if any.
        Parameters:
        variation - Variation
        Returns:
        An Optional, containing the live experience, if a live experience in the given variation exists, or empty otherwise.
        Since:
        0.7

      • getResolvedStateVariant

        java.util.Optional<StateVariant> getResolvedStateVariant()
        The state variant to which this state request resolved at run time. A state request can have either trivial resolution, or resolve to a StateVariant. Trivial resolution means that all live experiences are control experiences, and the user session will be targeted for the base state. If at least one live experience is a variant, the targeting operation will resolve to some state variant.
        Returns:
        The Optional containing the StateVariant object to which this request resolved, or empty if all live experiences are control.
        Since:
        0.7
        See Also:
        StateVariant

      • getResolvedParameters

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getResolvedParameters()
        The resolved state parameters as an immutable map, containing the merged maps of the state parameters defined at the state level and at the state variant level, with the latter taking precedence over former.
        Returns:
        Immutable map keyed by parameter names.
        Since:
        0.7
